name: He Who Would Be King
description:
This was made for a 30 day RPG Maker Default Assets Game Jam.

You must prove your worth to become king but you aren't the only one who seeks the throne of your father. You have a brother and so there must be a test to decide who will be the next king.

Your father gives both you and your brother a plot of land. You must turn that empty landmark into a kingdom of your own. Will you succeed or will your brother Gary beat you to the punch?

Gameplay: 

A management game where you build houses for Citizens, Farms for Food and Storehouses to house that Food. Mine for Ore, cut down trees or hire others to do it for you.

Credits:

Design: FleshToDust 

Splash Screen: FleshToDust

Plugins: Yanfly and Moghunter

Art & Audio: Yoji Ojima/RPG Maker
